title: In this zone quarry, mining, stone crushing or similar operations shall be permissible subject to provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: In this zone quarry, mining, stone crushing or similar operations shall be permissible subject to provisions of Regulation No.15.1. In addition to this following uses shall be permissible.
